newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: L&M buys property for S$9.5 million.
newsitem.headline: L&M buys property for S$9.5 million.

text.p: Engineering group L&M Group Investments Ltd said on Friday it was buying a piece of property in Singapore for S$9.5 million from Petrolite Pacific Pte Ltd.
The property will be used for the manufacture, maintenance and storage of geotechnical engineering equipement and materials.
